comment_en: Rice pudding and Qeshtota are unparalleled! Authentic taste and excellent portion size. Always a wonderful experience.
The best sweet Koshary I've ever tried! Nutella and Oreo are a perfect combination. Highly recommended.
Om Ali casseroles are hot and very delicious, especially with nuts and cream. Fast and excellent service.
All items are of high quality and clean. I loved the 'Al-Lo'a' with mango, its taste is unique and distinctive.
Always the first choice for desserts after lunch. Unchanging quality and reasonable prices.
The caramel Qeshtota is wonderful and perfectly made. Definitely an experience worth repeating.
